Appearance

On this page

Markdown 扩展功能示例 ​

本文档演示 VitePress 内置的 Markdown 扩展功能。

语法高亮 ​

VitePress 基于 Shiki 提供代码高亮功能，并支持行高亮显示等特性：

Input

md
```js{4}
export default {
  data () {
    return {
      msg: 'Highlighted!'
    }
  }
}
```

Output

js
export default {
  data () {
    return {
      msg: 'Highlighted!'
    }
  }
}

自定义容器 ​

输入示例

md
::: info
This is an info box.
:::

::: tip
This is a tip.
:::

::: warning
This is a warning.
:::

::: danger
This is a dangerous warning.
:::

::: details
This is a details block.
:::

渲染结果

INFO

This is an info box.

TIP

This is a tip.

WARNING

This is a warning.

DANGER

This is a dangerous warning.

Details

This is a details block.

More ​

Check out the documentation for the full list of markdown extensions.
